place: Seefeldstrasse 54, parterre rechts, Zurich VIII, Switzerland
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Pinker: Thanks for your letters of 12 and 14 inst. Mr Pound tells me the editor of Drama has written to him for my play. Will you therefore kindly send it to Chicago? It may be in time for the next issue (August), if accepted. You did not acknowledge receipt of the agreement signed and forwarded by me but I suppose you received it. Sincerely yours James Joyce
